chunk:
Directions: : Can be used morning and night. Apply to damp skin in a circular motion. Rinse. Good for 12 months once opened.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
